title: Kwun Tong Government Secondary School
summary: Kwun Tong Government Secondary School (Chinese: 觀塘官立中學; often abbreviated as KTGSS) is a co-educational and E.M.I. (English as Medium of Instruction) school. It was founded in 1982.  It is located at 9 Shun Chi Street, Shun Chi Court, Shun Lee, Kowloon, Hong Kong.
content:
Kwun Tong Government Secondary School (Chinese: 觀塘官立中學; often abbreviated as KTGSS) is a co-educational and E.M.I. (English as Medium of Instruction) school. It was founded in 1982.  It is located at 9 Shun Chi Street, Shun Chi Court, Shun Lee, Kowloon, Hong Kong.
